hero.title: Streamline Your Campus Operations
hero.subtitle: Transform how your university handles maintenance reports. From instant issue tracking to advanced analytics, AU Fondue empowers your admin and staff to resolve campus issues faster than ever before.

whatIs.title: What is AU Fondue?
whatIs.subtitle: Powerful Campus Management
whatIs.description: AU Fondue is a comprehensive maintenance management system designed for Assumption University to streamline campus facility issue reporting and resolution.

adminFeatures.title: For Administrators
adminFeatures.subtitle: Powerful Admin Features
adminFeatures.description: Everything you need to manage campus operations efficiently and effectively

reportOverview.title: Report Overview
reportOverview.description: View all maintenance reports with real-time status updates and comprehensive filtering options.

smartAssignment.title: Smart Task Assignment
smartAssignment.description: Intelligently assign issues to the most suitable maintenance staff based on expertise and availability.

excelExport.title: Excel Report Export
excelExport.description: Download detailed reports and logs in Excel format for comprehensive record keeping and analysis.

visualStats.title: Visual Stats & Charts
visualStats.description: Monitor trends and performance data through beautiful, interactive charts and dashboards.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Track staff performance, repair times, and efficiency metrics with detailed analytics and insights.

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Receive instant alerts and notifications when reports are submitted, updated, or completed.

userFeatures.title: For Students & Staff
userFeatures.subtitle: Effortless User Experience
userFeatures.description: Simple, intuitive tools that make reporting and tracking campus issues a breeze

fastReporting.title: Lightning-Fast Reporting
fastReporting.description: Submit maintenance issues from your phone in under 30 seconds with our streamlined interface.

liveTracking.title: Live Progress Tracking
liveTracking.description: Get real-time updates on your report status and know exactly when issues are being resolved.

history.title: Comprehensive History
history.description: Access your complete report history and download detailed records whenever you need them.

intuitiveDesign.title: Intuitive Design
intuitiveDesign.description: Beautifully crafted interface that's so simple, anyone can use it without training or tutorials.

about.title: About AU Fondue
about.subtitle: Our Story & Mission
about.tagline: Empowering Assumption University with next-generation campus management solutions
about.description2: AU Fondue was created specifically to address the unique challenges faced by Assumption University's Operations & Maintenance department. Our comprehensive platform streamlines the entire maintenance workflow, from initial issue reporting to final resolution tracking.
about.description3: By combining cutting-edge technology with deep understanding of campus operations, we've built a solution that not only improves efficiency but also enhances the overall campus experience for students, faculty, and staff.
about.innovationSubtitle: Leveraging modern technology for campus excellence

techStack.title: Our Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: Built with modern, reliable technologies to ensure scalability, security, and performance

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Campus?
cta.subtitle: Join us and try using AU Fondue today!
